name: Plain Rice
recipe: Rinse 1 cup of rice thoroughly until water runs clear
Add rice and 2 cups of water to a pot
Bring to boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 18-20 minutes
Let it rest for 5 minutes, then fluff with a fork
Serve hot as a side dish

name: Dal Tadka
recipe: Pressure cook 1 cup toor dal with 3 cups water for 3 whistles
Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds, garlic, and onions
Add tomatoes and spices, cook until soft
Add cooked dal and simmer for 10 minutes
Garnish with coriander and serve hot

name: Paneer Butter Masala
recipe: Blend tomatoes, onions, and spices to make a smooth paste
Heat butter in a pan and add the paste, cook for 10 minutes
Add cream and simmer for 5 minutes
Add paneer cubes and cook for 3-4 minutes
Garnish with cream and serve with naan or rice

name: Aloo Paratha
recipe: Boil and mash 2 medium potatoes with spices
Make dough with 2 cups wheat flour and water
Stuff potato mixture in dough balls and roll into parathas
Cook on hot tawa with ghee until golden brown
Serve hot with yogurt or pickle

name: Vegetable Biryani
recipe: Soak basmati rice for 30 minutes and cook until 70% done
Sauté mixed vegetables with biryani spices
Layer rice and vegetables in a heavy-bottomed pan
Add saffron milk and steam for 20 minutes
Garnish with fried onions and serve hot

name: Chicken Tikka
recipe: Marinate chicken pieces in yogurt and tikka spices for 2 hours
Thread chicken onto skewers
Grill or bake at 200°C for 20-25 minutes
Baste with oil and spices halfway through cooking
Serve hot with mint chutney and onion salad

name: Tofu Stir Fry
recipe: Press tofu for 30 minutes to remove excess water
Cut tofu into cubes and stir-fry until golden
Add chopped bell peppers and garlic
Add soy sauce and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes
Garnish with green onions and serve hot

name: Boiled Egg
recipe: Place eggs in a pot and cover with cold water
Bring water to boil over medium heat
Once boiling, remove from heat and let stand for 10-12 minutes
Transfer eggs to ice water to stop cooking
Peel and serve with salt and pepper

name: Roti (Chapati)
recipe: Mix 2 cups whole wheat flour with salt and water to make dough
Knead dough for 10 minutes until smooth
Divide into small balls and roll into thin circles
Cook on hot tawa until bubbles appear
Flip and cook other side, then puff over flame

name: Chole (Chickpea Curry)
recipe: Soak chickpeas overnight and pressure cook until soft
Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until golden
Add tomatoes and spices, cook until oil separates
Add cooked chickpeas and simmer for 15 minutes
Garnish with coriander and serve with rice or bread
